dimensions.label: Work Ethic
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle work deadlines?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach deadlines with a laid-back attitude, prioritizing flexibility over strict timelines.
Your FarTwin will tackle deadlines with an aggressive and driven mindset, pushing through obstacles to meet goals.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach uncertain situations with a cautious and conservative mindset, weighing risks before making decisions.
Your FarTwin will face uncertainty with an adventurous and open-minded attitude, seeking out new experiences and challenges.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with strangers?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer to engage in social interactions with people they know well, taking time to warm up to new acquaintances.
Your FarTwin will approach strangers with confidence and enthusiasm, seeking out opportunities for conversation and connection.

dimensions.label: Goal Setting
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin set goals?

options.description: Your FarTwin will set ambitious and challenging goals, striving to push beyond their limits and achieve exceptional results.
Your FarTwin will set realistic and achievable goals, prioritizing progress over perfection and taking a practical approach to success.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly and honestly express their emotions, using words to convey feelings and thoughts.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions private, preferring to internalize feelings before sharing them with others.

dimensions.label: Decision Making
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will trust their intuition, making decisions based on gut feelings and instinct rather than logical analysis.
Your FarTwin will approach decision-making with a systematic and analytical mindset, weighing options and considering multiple perspectives before acting.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize flexibility and adaptability when managing time, allowing for spontaneity and changes in plans.
Your FarTwin will approach time management with a structured and organized mindset, creating schedules and sticking to routines.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach conflicts with a confrontational attitude, directly challenging opposing views and assertively expressing their own opinions.
Your FarTwin will handle conflicts with a collaborative mindset, seeking common ground and working towards mutually beneficial solutions.
